title: Let us turn Pakistan into country where public service defines politics: PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 28 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Saturday underlined to turn Pakistan into a country where public service delivery was regarded as the definition of politics.
In a tweet, the prime minister expressed his opinion over the state of politics and society.
“Let us turn Pakistan into a country where difference of opinion is not treated as an act of enmity; where criticism is faced with courage; where public service delivery is the definition of politics; where women are treated with respect & the rights of minorities are protected.”
